pages.text: allahanu dhikkarigalannu sapisiruvanu mattu avarigagi bhugileluva benkiyannu sajjugolisittiruvanu
avaru adaralli sadakala iruvaru. Avarige posakanagali, sahayakanagali sigalaranu
avara (dhikkarigala) mukhagalannu narakada benkiyalli tiruci maguci, sudalaguva a dina avaru, ‘‘ayyo, navu allahana hagu avana dutara ajnegalannu palisiddare estu cennagittu’’ ennuvaru
mattu avaru heluvaru; ‘‘nam'modeya, navu nam'ma nayakaru mattu nam'ma doddavara ajnegalannu palisidevu mattu avaru nam'mannu darigedisi bittaru’’
‘‘nam'modeya, ninu avarige duppattu sikseyannu nidu mattu avarannu mahasapakke guripadisu’’
visvasigale, musarannu pidisidavarante nivagabedi. Avara aropagalinda allahanu, avarannu (musarannu) muktagolisidanu. Allahana drstiyalli avaru (musa) bahala gauravanvitaragiddaru
visvasigale, allahanige anjiri mattu sada neravada matanne adiri
allahanu nim'ma karmagalannu sudharisuvanu mattu nim'ma papagalannu ksamisuvanu. Allahana hagu avana dutara ajnegalannu palisidavanu nijakku maha vijayavannu sadhisidanu

navu i honeyannu akasagala, bhumiya hagu parvatagala mundittevu. Avugalu i hone horuvudakke hinjaridavu mattu idakke anjidavu. Konege manusyanu i honeyannu hottanu. Nijakku avanu akrami hagu ajnaniyagiddane

Allahanu kapata purusaru hagu striyarannu mattu bahudevaradhaka purusaru hagu striyarannu siksisuvanu mattu visvasi purusaru hagu visvasi striyara pascattapavannu svikarisuvanu. Allahanantu atyanta ksamasilanu karunamayiyu agiddane
hogalikegalella allahanige. Akasagalalli hagu bhumiyalliruva ellavu avanige serive. Paralokadallu ella prasansegalu avanige salluvavu mattu avanu atyanta yuktivanta hagu arivu ullavanagiddane
